00106             function                get_root_item( $Items )
00107             {
00108                   try
00109                   {
00110                         foreach( $Items as $i => $v )
00111                         {
00112                               if( $v->page == $v->root_page )
00113                               {
00114                                     return( $v );
00115                               }
00116                         }
00117                         
00118                         return( false );
00119                   }
00120                   catch( Exception $e )
00121                   {
00122                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00123                   }
00124             }

00248             function                compile_map_items( $Map , $RootItem , $Items )
00249             {
00250                   try
00251                   {
00252                         $MapPart = '';
00253                         
00254                         foreach( $Items as $i )
00255                         {
00256                               if( $i->root_page == $RootItem->page && $i->root_page != $i->page )
00257                               {
00258                                     if( $MapPart === '' )
00259                                     {
00260                                           $MapPart .= '<ul>';
00261                                     }
00262                                     $MapPart .= $this->compile_map( $i , $Items );
00263                               }
00264                         }
00265                         
00266                         if( $MapPart !== '' )
00267                         {
00268                               $MapPart .= '</ul>';
00269                         }
00270                         
00271                         return( $MapPart );
00272                   }
00273                   catch( Exception $e )
00274                   {
00275                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00276                   }
00277             }
00278             
00305             function                compile_map( $RootItem , $Items )
00306             {
00307                   try
00308                   {
00309                         $Map = '';
00310                         
00311                         $PageDescription = $PageAccess->get_page_description( $RootItem->page );
00312                         
00313                         $Map .= '<li>'.( strlen( $RootItem->navigation ) ? $RootItem->navigation : 
00314                               '{href:tpl=std;page=./'.$RootItem->page.'.html;raw_text='.$PageDescription[ 'title' ].'}' );
00315                         
00316                         $Map .= $this->compile_map_items( $Map , $RootItem , $Items );
00317                         
00318                         $Map .= '</li>';
00319                         
00320                         return( $Map );
00321                   }
00322                   catch( Exception $e )
00323                   {
00324                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00325                   }
00326             }

00350             function                draw_map( $Options )
00351             {
00352                   try
00353                   {
00354                         $Data = $this->Cache->get_data( 'full_map' );
00355                         if( $Data === false )
00356                         {
00357                               $Access = get_package( 'system_structure::system_structure_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00358                               
00359                               $Items = $Access->unsafe_select();
00360                               $RootItem = $this->get_root_item( $Items );
00361                               
00362                               $Map  = '<ul>';
00363                               $Map .= $this->compile_map( $RootItem , $Items );
00364                               $Map .= '</ul>';
00365                               
00366                               $this->Cache->add_data( 'full_map' , $Map );
00367                               
00368                               $this->Output = $Map;
00369                         }
00370                         else
00371                         {
00372                               $this->Output = $Data;
00373                         }
00374                   }
00375                   catch( Exception $e )
00376                   {
00377                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00378                   }
00379             }

00403             function                draw_bread_crumbs( $Options )
00404             {
00405                   try
00406                   {
00407                         $PageName = $this->Security->get_g( 'page_name' , 'command' );
00408                         $Data = $this->Cache->get_data( "bread_crumbs_for_$PageName" );
00409                         
00410                         if( $Data === false )
00411                         {
00412                               $Access = get_package( 'system_structure::system_structure_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00413                               $Items = $Access->unsafe_select();
00414                               $MainItem = $this->get_item( $PageName , $Items );
00415                               $Counter = 0;
00416                               
00417                               if( $MainItem !== false )
00418                               {
00419                                     $PageAccess = get_package( 'page::page_access' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00420                                     $PageDescription = $PageAccess->get_page_description( $MainItem->page );
00421                                     $Str = strlen( $MainItem->navigation ) != 0 ? $MainItem->navigation : '{href:tpl=std;page=./'.
00422                                                 $MainItem->page.'.html;raw_text='.$PageDescription[ 'title' ].'}';
00423                                     $Counter++;
00424                                     
00425                                     $Separator = $this->Settings->get_package_setting( 
00426                                           'system_structure::system_structure_view' , 'last' , 'cf_system_structure' , 
00427                                           'bread_crumbs_separator' , '&nbsp;&gt;&nbsp;'
00428                                     );
00429                                     while( $MainItem !== false && $MainItem->page != $MainItem->root_page )
00430                                     {
00431                                           $Str = $Separator.$Str;
00432                                           $MainItem = $this->get_item( $MainItem->root_page , $Items );
00433                                           $PageDescription = $PageAccess->get_page_description( $MainItem->page );
00434                                           $Str = ( 
00435                                                 strlen( $MainItem->navigation ) != 0 ? $MainItem->navigation : '{href:tpl=std;page=./'.
00436                                                 $MainItem->page.'.html;raw_text='.$PageDescription[ 'title' ].'}' 
00437                                           ).$Str;
00438                                           $Counter++;
00439                                     }
00440                               }
00441                               else
00442                               {
00443                                     $Str = '';
00444                               }
00445 
00446                               if( $Options->get_setting( 'show_on_root_page' , false ) == false )
00447                               {
00448                                     if( $Counter == 1 )
00449                                     {
00450                                           $Str = '';
00451                                     }
00452                               }
00453                               
00454                               $this->Cache->add_data( "bread_crumbs_for_$PageName" , $Str );
00455                                     
00456                               $this->Output = $Str;
00457                         }
00458                         else
00459                         {
00460                               $this->Output = $Data;
00461                         }
00462                   }
00463                   catch( Exception $e )
00464                   {
00465                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00466                   }
00467             }

00491             function                view( $Options )
00492             {
00493                   try
00494                   {
00495                         $ContextSet = get_package_object( 'gui::context_set' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00496                         
00497                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_map' );
00498                         $ContextSet->add_context( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cfcx_bread_crumbs' );
00499                         
00500                         $ContextSet->execute( $Options , $this , __FILE__ );
00501                         
00502                         return( $this->Output );
00503                   }
00504                   catch( Exception $e )
00505                   {
00506                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00507                   }
00508             }
